Class YieldCurveLoader

Namespace
ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Loaders
Assembly
ECBFinanceAPI.dll

Loads yield curves by retrieving yield curve quotes and parameters, and constructing YieldCurve instances.

public class YieldCurveLoader : IYieldCurveLoader

Constructors

YieldCurveLoader()

Initializes a new instance of the YieldCurveLoader class with default implementations of the quote and parameter loaders, which are YieldCurveQuoteLoader and YieldCurveParameterLoader respectively.

public YieldCurveLoader()

YieldCurveLoader(IYieldCurveQuoteLoader, IYieldCurveParameterLoader)

Initializes a new instance of the YieldCurveLoader class with the specified quote loader and parameter loader.

public YieldCurveLoader(IYieldCurveQuoteLoader yieldCurveQuoteLoader, IYieldCurveParameterLoader yieldCurveParameterLoader)

Parameters

yieldCurveQuoteLoader IYieldCurveQuoteLoader

The loader responsible for retrieving yield curve quotes.

yieldCurveParameterLoader IYieldCurveParameterLoader

The loader responsible for retrieving Nelson-Siegel-Svensson parameters.

YieldCurveLoader(HttpClient)

Initializes a new instance of the YieldCurveLoader class using the provided HttpClient.

public YieldCurveLoader(HttpClient httpClient)

Parameters

httpClient HttpClient

An HttpClient used to perform download requests.

Methods

GetYieldCurveAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, DateTime, MaturityFrequency)

Asynchronously gets a single yield curve for a specified government bond nominal rating, quote type, date, and maturity frequency.

public Task<YieldCurve> GetYieldCurveAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, DateTime date, MaturityFrequency maturityFrequency)

Parameters

governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating

The government bond nominal rating for which to retrieve the yield curve.

quoteType QuoteType

The type of yield curve quote.

date DateTime

The date for which to retrieve the yield curve.

maturityFrequency MaturityFrequency

The frequency of maturities on the yield curve.

Returns

Task<YieldCurve>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the retrieved YieldCurve.

GetYieldCurvesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType, DateTime, DateTime, MaturityFrequency)

Asynchronously gets a collection of yield curves for a specified government bond nominal rating, quote type, date range, and maturity frequency.

public Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurve>> GetYieldCurvesAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, QuoteType quoteType, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate, MaturityFrequency maturityFrequency)

Parameters

governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating

The government bond nominal rating for which to retrieve the yield curves.

quoteType QuoteType

The type of yield curve quote.

startDate DateTime

The start date of the date range for which to retrieve yield curves.

endDate DateTime

The end date of the date range for which to retrieve yield curves.

maturityFrequency MaturityFrequency

The frequency of maturities on the yield curves.

Returns

Task<IEnumerable<YieldCurve>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a collection of retrieved YieldCurve instances.
